title: PCB joins hands with Pink Ribbon to spread awareness on breast cancer
text:
The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has joined hands with Pink Ribbon to spread awareness on breast cancer during the third T20I between Pakistan and Sri Lanka on October 9.

Lahore’s Gaddafi Stadium will be displaying pink color with players, match officials and commentators wearing a pink ribbon.

A short ceremony will also be conducted prior to the third fixture which will be attended by the president of Pakistan Arif Alvi.

On the other hand, the PCB in collaboration with Pink Ribbon has also decided to distribute around 12,000 pink ribbons and T-shirts among the spectators in different stands of the ground.
